chapters.title: Chapter 47: More Tales of the Wheel
chapters.info: el'Leanna ti Mandragoran, p. 596—Queen of Malkier before it was overrun. She was Akir's wife, and Lan's father. She died, with her husband and country, the day the Trollocs overran Malkier. See also Gemallen, Cowin; Mandragoran, Akir; Mandragoran, Breyan; Mandragoran, Isam; Mandragoran, Lain; Mandragoran, Lan.
